feature_model.name: REAL-FM-19.xml

meta.data: Feature model of a graph editor

Hong Mei, Wei Zhang, and Fang Gu. A feature oriented approach to modeling and reusing requirements of software product lines. Computer Software and Applications Conference, 2003. COMPSAC 2003. Proceedings. 27th Annual International, pages 250â€“256, Nov. 2003

feature_model.feature_tree: :r graph (f0) :m services (f1) :m graph_manipulation (graph_manipulation) :m delete (f3) :m select (f4) :m selection_mode (f5) :g [1,1] (f6) : increment_selection (f7) : non_increment_selection (f8) :m add (f9) :m entity_add (f10) :m connector_add (f11) :m move (f12) :m moving_mode (f13) :g [1,1] (f14) : outline_moving (f15) : content_moving (f16) :o moving_constraint (f17) :g [1,1] (f18) : horizontal_constraint (f19) : vertical_constraint (f20) :o compose (compose) :o layer_adjust (layer_adjust) :m up_layer (f21) :m down_layer (f22) :o do_undo_redo (do_undo_redo) :m select_do_undo_redo (f23) :m add_do_undo_redo (f24) :m delete _do_undo_redo (f25) :m move_do_undo_redo (f26) :o compose_do_undo_redo (compose_do_undo_redo) :o layer_adjust_do_undo_redo (layer_adjust_do_undo_redo) :o zoom_inout (zoom_inout)
feature_model.constraints: c1a: ~do_undo_redo or graph_manipulation c1b: ~zoom_inout or graph_manipulation c2a: ~compose or ~do_undo_redo or graph_manipulation c2b: ~compose_do_undo_redo or compose c2c: ~compose_do_undo_redo or do_undo_redo c3a: ~layer_adjust or ~do_undo_redo or layer_adjust_do_undo_redo c3b: ~layer_adjust_do_undo_redo or do_undo_redo c3c: ~layer_adjust_do_undo_redo or layer_adjust
